• home

Lip Blushing Cape Town: Get your lips looking amazing 24/7

You’re tired of having to reapply your lipstick every hour, and you want a way to make your lips look plumper.

Lip blushing is the perfect solution for women who are looking for an easy way to get fuller-looking lips without surgery or injections. It’s also great for those with thin lips that need some colour and definition. And since lip blushing lasts 3 to 5 years, it’s a long-lasting alternative to applying makeup daily!

Lip Blushing is semi-permanent makeup that gives you fullness and definition. The procedure takes about two hours, but the results last up to five years! Let’s get your lips looking amazing 24/7.

 

Gives pale, lifeless, or asymmetrical lips a natural tint of colour, fullness, and definition. Lip blush can give lips 30% more volume that will last, unlike fillers. Various colours are available in all different shades to suit the look you want to achieve and compliment your natural complexion.

Book Your procedure

What is lip blushing and how does it work?

Lip blushing is a semi-permanent makeup technique that gives your lips a natural-looking colour and fullness. The treatment involves using a fine needle to deposit pigment into the lips. Lip blushing can last up to three to five years, and it’s a great way to enhance your natural lip colour or give your lips some definition.


Lip blushing is a minimally invasive procedure, the results are instant and long-lasting. It can be done in any colour, and it is perfect for those who want to add a little bit of colour to their lips without going overboard.


It’s also great for those who have naturally pale lips or who want to achieve a more natural look. Lip blushing is an affordable and convenient way to get the perfect pout, so what are you waiting for? Schedule your appointment with a lip-blushing specialist today!

Book Your procedure

The benefits of Lip Blushing

  • A great way to enhance your natural lip colour.
  • More defined lips while still looking NATURAL
  • Create fullness and symmetry to thin or asymmetrical lips
  • WATERPROOF and SWEAT-PROOF (no more sweat/water smudges)
  • Fuller-looking lips without need for injectables or surgery
  • Look good 24/7 – wake up with makeup
  • Convenience – improve daily lifestyle and save time
  • Color correction for scars and uneven pigmentation
Book Your procedure

How Does the Permanent Lip Blushing Procedure Work at Blink Aesthetic Clinics?

Home Preparation

If you suffer from fever blisters or ever had fever blisters in your life, it is important to take an anti-viral oral medication 3 days before your lip blush procedure.  This is only available on a prescription from your doctor.  The medication prevents a potential fever blister breakout.

Clients are encouraged to ensure their lips are hydrated as it improves the results.  The better the lip condition, the better the results.  It is not advisable to have lip blush if you have dry cracked lips.

We highly recommend taking arnica tablets 3 days before your appointment as it will assist with the healing process.

Before Treatment

A thorough consultation starts our appointment to understand your unique requirements, style, colour, and lifestyle factors.  This helps determine our custom-made design for each client.

We proceed to map and design lip shapes to compliment your beautiful facial features and show you the design to approve.  

Our goal is to create beautiful and natural-looking lips that compliment your facial features; finding the perfect colour and shape for just your face is what we do best as experts in the field.

A strong anaesthetic is applied to the area to numb the skin and ensure that the procedure is comfortable.

During Treatment

After the numbing is complete, the lip blushing will begin. The lip specialist will use a digital pen to finely and perfectly place pixels of pigment in the top layer of the skin.  The fine needles are so fine that they create a natural-looking effect. The lip expert will match the pigment to your 

Most clients describe the procedure as a vibration/brow massage and fall asleep.

After Treatment

After your treatment, you will receive an aftercare kit and detailed instructions on how to care for your lips. This will provide additional guidance on what you should and shouldn’t do. Don’t worry – the healing process is short, only lasting 3-4 days! Most of our clients report that they experienced slight dryness and itchiness during this time. 

Our aftercare ointment will provide comfort during the healing process.

Book Your procedure

Why Choose Blink Beauty for Your Permanent Lip Blushing Treatment?

Our lips are such a big feature of our face, and whilst most clients wish to have fuller-looking lips its not necessary to make use of injectables.

It is not a secret that a lot of people are not confident with their looks. Some might feel that their noses are too big, while others are not happy with the size and shape of their breasts. Then there are those who are not confident with the colour of their skin or hair.

But one of the most common confidence-related issues is having thin lips.

Lucky for you, there is a solution to this problem, which comes in the form of permanent Lip blushing. This treatment will help you achieve fuller, more voluptuous lips without using fillers or other temporary solutions.

At Blink Beauty, we offer the best permanent Lip blushing treatments in Cape Town. We use the latest techniques and technology to help you achieve the lips you have always wanted.

The whole process will be comfortable and relaxing, and you will be able to see the results immediately. So why wait any longer? Book your appointment with us today, and let us help you achieve the perfect pout!

Book Your procedure

Lip blushing before and after

Lip Neutralization before and after

Book Your procedure

Testimonials

Beautiful environment and beautiful results leaving you with a beautiful finished face. 🤤 Check it out your face won't be sorry! 🤞🏽
Demi-Lee Weitz

Candy is absolutely amazing! She makes you feel warm & welcome from the beginning. She could see that I was very nervous, and immediately went out of her way to make me as comfortable and calm about the treatment as possible. She is very professional in what she does and I will highly recommend her for permanent lips

Book Your procedure

What Does Lip Blushing Cost?

  • Lip blushing (150 minutes) R3 650
  • Lip blushing follow-up (120 minutes) R1 200
  • Lip neutralization (150 minutes) R3 650
Book Your procedure

Frequently asked questions about lip blushing

What is Lip Blushing?

Lip blushing is a semi-permanent makeup technique that gives your lips a natural-looking colour and fullness. The treatment involves using a fine needle to deposit pigment into the lips. Lip blushing can last three to five years, and it's a great way to enhance your natural lip colour or give your lips some definition.

How long does Lip Blushing last?

Lip blushing is semi-permanent and can last between three and five years. However, the results may vary depending on your skin type, lifestyle, and aftercare.

What are the benefits of Lip Blushing?

There are many benefits of Lip blushing, including it is a great way to enhance your natural lip colour, Lip blushing can make your lips look fuller and plumper, Lip blushing is a long-lasting treatment, Lip blushing is semi-permanent and can last three to five years, Lip blushing is a simple, three-step process that only takes about two hours.

Lip Neutralization is aimed at neutralizing the melanin (Darker colour) in lips. The main aim is to even out the lip colour for an even natural-looking pink lip.  Lip Neutralization is a specialist treatment and should only be performed by accredited lip neutralization therapists.  At Blink, we are one of very few salons that specialize in lip neutralizations.

Is Lip Blushing safe?

At Blink Beauty we use the highest health and safety standards to protect our clients as well as team members.  We ensure we discuss thorough aftercare with our clients for best results

How long does the Lip Blushing procedure take?

The Lip blushing procedure usually takes about two hours. 

What do I need to do before my Lip Blushing appointment?

If you suffer from fever blisters or ever had fever blisters in your life, it is important to take an anti-viral oral medication 3 days before your lip blush procedure.  This is only available on prescription from your dr.  The medication prevents a potential fever blister breakout.

Clients are encouraged to ensure their lips are hydrated as it improves the results.  The better the lip condition, the better the results.  It is not advisable to have lip blush if you have dry cracked lips.

We highly recommend taking arnica tablets 3 days before your appointment as it will assist with the healing process.

What should I expect during and after my Lip Blushing appointment?

During your Lip blushing appointment, a numbing cream will be applied to your lips to minimize any discomfort. Then, the pigment will be injected into your lips using a fine needle. After the procedure, your lips will be swollen and tender. Our special aftercare ointment is applied to help soothe your lips. The swelling and tenderness usually subside within 12 to 24 hours from your procedure.

How much does Lip Blushing cost?

The cost of Lip blushing / Lip Neutralization varies depending on the expertise of the salon. Most Lip blushing treatments range from R3650 to R6000.

If a treatment plan is advised in special cases additional costs may be incurred for more sessions.

Is Lip Blushing covered by insurance?

Lip blushing is considered a cosmetic procedure and is not typically covered by insurance / medical aid.

Who is a good candidate for Lip Blushing?

Most people are good candidates for Lip blushing. However, those with allergies to the pigments used or who have active infections should not get Lip blushing. If you are pregnant or breastfeeding, you should wait until after you have given birth or stopped breastfeeding before getting Lip blushing.

How many sessions are needed?

Lip Blushing:

Your initial appointment is scheduled whereafter an 8 week touchup appointment is needed for best results.

Lip Neutralization:

We recommend the initial appointment and up to 4 follow-up appointments for best results and full coverage.

What is the difference between Lip Blushing & Lip Neutralization

Lip Blushing is the process of adding colour to pale lips.  Usually recommended for light/pale skin complexions.

Lip Neutralization is the process of counter-balancing dark/melanin-rich lips to provide a natural pink looking lip.  Usually recommended for ethnic/darker skin complexions.

How will my colour look?

Prior to starting with the procedure, we will analyze your skin type, colour, and requirements. We will discuss the target colour you wish to achieve, to which every client's unique colour is expertly blended to achieve their desired results. As the skin heals fine scabs form, and some of the initial colour fades away.  A before & after photo is taken to compare the colour after treatment vs. the colour retained after 8 weeks, comparing the results will help us determine the colour required at the follow up session.

All of our procedures are aimed at only providing a beautiful complimenting colour and design that looks natural every day. It removes discoloration, and adds definition and vibrancy to your facial features.

All our clients fall in love with their new transformed lips and we are excited to help you with your lip transformation journey.

Photos on our website are directly after the procedure, and colour normally fades about 20 to 60% from intensity of colour.

I'm nervous, its my first time. What should I do?

To all our new clients, we understand that this might be a daunting appointment and we take great care to put our clients at ease before, during, and after the procedure. As soon as you have met us, we have explained the steps of our appointment, and you'll feel right at ease.

Our aim is to always have a natural look that compliments you! And each client is so uniquely beautiful that we take the time to provide you with a beautiful look that you will feel extra confident about.

Should you have some unanswered questions, please send us a WhatsApp - we are here to guide you every step of the way!

Can I do lip blushing over previous permanent makeup?

The short answer is yes.  At Blink we do many lip blushing over existing/old permanent makeup.

 

If you have prominent colour from existing permanent makeup on your lips, please send us a photo to asses.
